
                            
                            <p>首页滚动有个300-15的银联自动充值享油惠活动，先去把要签约的卡限额285，以防反撸，再去开通签约设置当前余额自动充300，比如我现在余额1277.20，设置1277充300这样，然后就会自动充值抵扣优惠，一天1次，一月2次，第二天解约重复第一天的操作就行。<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/20/114826h070guzgh2hgh3g3.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/20/114826h070guzgh2hgh3g3.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/20/115424g0j0p42777gzz35f.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/20/115424g0j0p42777gzz35f.jpg"> </p>
